ModMetaData.name: Need a Light? - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: WandererOBTm101
ModMetaData.description:
Fire When you want it. Need a light? Adds 2 tools used to start a fire. The first is the simple flint and steel. And the second is a hardy fliptop steel lighter. Craftable at a crafting spot or smithy.
This is an early release and might be bugs. Please let me know here:
